name: Potion Motion
description:
A 2019 Game Jam game from Fitchburg State University.  Play as Katie, a little witch who messed up her grand wizards potions and must shake them to prevent them from exploding. NEEDS XBOX ONE CONTROLLER TO WORK! Press the button for the corresponding  potion, then shake using the joystick! 

Programmers: Kris Camp, TJ Bourget, David Marshall

Lead Animator: Kiria Bentley

Animators: David Marshall, Kris Camp, Nicole Filios, Robert Morrison

Background Artist: Nicole Filios

UI Design: Robert Morrison

Special thanks to Keegs, Riley, and my tutor! :D
